TopicTitle: Distance from Kerbal to the Sun

Articles.Content: Why is the distance from Kerbal to the Sun given as 13,450,000,000 km in my orbit view? Thats barely 0.08 AU. Those kerbals should be crispyfried.

But Kerbol is not a yellow main sequence star. Most theories make Kerbol a red dwarf, or something along those lines.

EDIT: Kerbol, not Kerbin.
i was abotu to reply why you said kerbin instead of kerbol
You have to remember that Kerbol is a lot smaller than Sol and Kerbin is much smaller than the Earth.
